description:
I've been asked so many times to go into some more detail about making a black wash for terrain/tiles. So here it is, how the make the easiest black wash possible. Really, it doesn't get any simpler than this.

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: How To Make A Cheap & Easy Black Wash For Your D&D Terrain Tutorial (Episode 012)
